title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Copa Airlines eyes US loyalty opportunities, ‘fundamentals’ over ‘flashy’ seats and tech
items.description: Copa Airlines is making a big push to attract U.S. customers after a big expansion in North America.

items.title: Rakuten American Express review: One of the best ways to earn Membership Rewards points

items.title: How much should I tip when I travel?
items.description: Even the most seasoned travelers may find that tipping while traveling can be an extremely complex and personal thing.

items.title: 'Winter is here' as first US ski resorts of the season open their lifts
items.description: The U.S. ski season is off to a fresh start, with Keystone and A-Basin opening this weekend.
